parameter.name: postalCodeStartsWith
parameter.description: The first characters or letters of a postal code.

parameter.name: placeName
parameter.description: All fields : placename,postal code, country, admin name.

parameter.name: placeNameStartsWith
parameter.description: The first characters of a place name.

parameter.name: country
parameter.description: Default is all countries. The country parameter may occur more than once,country=FR,country=GP

parameter.name: countryBias
parameter.description: Records from the countryBias are listed first.

parameter.name: maxRows
parameter.description: The maximal number of rows in the document returned by the service. Default is 10.

parameter.name: style
parameter.description: The verbosity of returned xml document, default = MEDIUM.

parameter.name: operator
parameter.description: The the operator 'AND' searches for all terms in the placename parameter, the operator 'OR' searches for any term, default = AND.

parameter.name: charset
parameter.description: The default is 'UTF8', defines the encoding used for the document returned by the web service.

parameter.name: isReduced
parameter.description: The default is 'false', when set to 'true' only the UK outer codes are returned. Attention: the default value on the commercial servers is currently set to 'true'. It will be changed later to 'false'.

parameter.name: east
parameter.description: The bounding box, only features within the box are returned.

parameter.name: west
parameter.description: The bounding box, only features within the box are returned.

parameter.name: north
parameter.description: The bounding box, only features within the box are returned.

parameter.name: south
parameter.description: The bounding box, only features within the box are returned.

parameter.name: responseType
parameter.description: The responseType of the response of the postalCodeSearch method.
